name: Double Blueberry Pancakes
ingredients: 1 1/4 c. milk 2 c. fresh or frozen blueberries (if using frozen berries,
1/3 c. sugar thaw, rinse and drain)
1/3 c. sour cream or plain yogurt
steps: Stir Bisquick, milk, sugar, sour cream, and eggs into large bowl to blend. Gently stir in blueberries.
Pour onto hot greased griddle to cook.
